Name: B5200
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.
Review: Layering this drink is as easy as inflating a life jacket - drink a few and you'll need one.
History: Discovered in 2003 at Circus Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of B5200 contains 137 calories
